review: We bought this to take on our 2 week vacation for our kids to watch in the condo. It was perfect. The voice command search option was great for them so they didn't have to type in what they wanted to search for. We thought we would try it out and maybe return it, but this is a keeper. It is so tiny and easy to hook up that we can take it even on short trips. Great buy!

review: Amazons fire tv is great with only a few caveats. First their amazing voice search feature only searches amazon for the requested content, as apposed to the roku 2 and 3 where their search feature will search all streaming content no matter its origin. Meaning you cant use fire tv to search netflix. This seems like only a minor annoyance until you realize if you have both netflix and amazon prime you will have to search for the same thing at least twice maybe more depending on how many different streaming services you use. Besides that the quality is great and i was impress when i first plugged it in it managed to immediately find my account without even having to log in, this is probably because i had a kindle fire on the same network but it was simple to set up and started working right away.
